info.name: legible_pcmonitors.info
info.description: This style improves readability of www.pcmonitors.info on a FHD (1920x1080) screen.
info.additionalInfo:
version 1

This style requires fonts "Fira Sans" and "Quercus" to be installed on the user's PC.
I run Ubuntu 14.04 and have tested it on that box with Firefox 34.
